definitions: a plant related to the club mosses, having a dense rosette of long slender leaves, the bases of which contain the spore-producing organs, and occurring typically as a submerged aquatic.

notes.text: Genus Isoetes, family Isoetaceae, class Lycopsida

shortDefinitions: plant related to clubmosses, with dense rosette of long slender leaves, bases of which contain spore-producing organs
